snippet: The crystal football Alabama received for winning the Bowl Championship Series title game in January was shattered last weekend when a player’s father accidentally knocked it off a display.
abstract: Crystal football Alabama received for winning the Bowl Championship Series title game in January is shattered when a player’s father accidentally knocks it off a display.
